    • Method Detail

      • doesPointCollideWithStructure

        public static boolean doesPointCollideWithStructure(Vec3 point,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Tetrahedron> list)
        Method that determines wheather a given point is within the bounds of any of the tetrahedrons in the ArrayList list NOTE: If the point is coplanar it is considered within the bounds
        Parameters:
        point - point to check against this shape
        Returns:
        true if point is on or within this tetrahedron

      • doesTetraCollideWithList

        public static boolean doesTetraCollideWithList(Tetrahedron t,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<Tetrahedron> list)
        Checks if the Tetrahedron provided is intersecting any Tetrahedron from the list
        Parameters:
        t - Tetrahedron to check
        list - List to check against
        Returns:
        True if collides, false if not

      • pointContained

        public boolean pointContained(Vec3 point)
        Checks if the given point falls withing this tetrahedron
        Parameters:
        point - point to check
        Returns:
        true if point is contained within this tetrahedron

      • getFace

        public Triangle getFace(int index)
        Gets one of the face triangles of the Tetrahedron, if the index param is out of range then this method returns null
        Parameters:
        index - index to return
        Returns:
        face triangle of the tetrahedron, null if index is out of range

      • setFace

        public void setFace(Triangle t,
                    int index)
        Sets one of the faces of the Tetrahedron, if the index given is outside of the valid range of the array then this method is a no op
        Parameters:
        t - triangle to add to the list
        index - index to add to 0-3

        Returns:
        4th point
